snippet: Michael Phelps won his showdown with Ryan Lochte at the Indianapolis Grand Prix on Saturday.
abstract: Michael Phelps wins his showdown with Ryan Lochte at the Indianapolis Grand Prix , finishing the 200 individual medley in 1 minute 56.32 seconds, nearly two seconds faster than this year’s previous world best and more than three seconds ahead of Lochte, who finished third.
lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps won his showdown with Ryan Lochte at the Indianapolis Grand Prix on Saturday.
